mapper.insert: insert into product (category, pname, price, writer, description, made_by) values (#{category}, #{pname}, #{price}, #{writer}, #{description}, #{madeBy})
mapper.select: select pno, category, pname, price, writer, mod_at, read_count, cmt_qty from product order by pno desc
mapper.update: update product set category=#{category}, pname=#{pname}, price=#{price}, description=#{description}, made_by=#{madeBy}, mod_at=now() where pno = #{pno}
